title: Edu Lobo - Vento Bravo (2007).avi
description:
This documentary talks about Edu Lobo from the composer of the festivals to the author of soundtracks for movies and music to theater. Edu created a brilliant style, mixing the music from Northeastern Brazil with Bossa Nova, during a time in which he lived with Vinicius, Tom Jobim, Baden Powell and Carlos Lyra.

Era natural que o compositor carioca, filho de pernambucanos, acabasse procurando uma mÃƒÂºsica, como ele diz, prÃƒÂ³xima de sua alma.
